display_long_description:
**On Point** is a retro shooter, filled with Warioware-style arcade minigames. Think, aim, and blast your way to a high score through endless shooting minigames, but don't hit those bombs or you'll run out of lives!

[media]

## ABOUT
- Compete in over 100 arcade-style target shooting minigames. 
- Earn Tickets and Unlock new Minigames.
- Calibrate, Chill, Expert, One-off, and Marathon modes. 
- Local, global, and friends leaderboards. 
- Immersive VR experience, tuned for all experience and comfort levels. 
- Various accessibility options to tune comfort and difficulty.

[media]

## GAME MODES

- **Calibrate:** New tutorial level to get you started. After completing calibration, you'll start earning Arcade Tickets. Use your tickets to unlock new mini-games and game modes!

- **Chill:** Learn the ropes in some of the key types of mini-games, or just practice without much pressure.

- **Expert:** Up the stakes with a huge variety of more difficult mini-games that you'll need to unlock as you progress. Similar to the classic arcade-style gameplay.

- **One-Off Mode (NEW):** Play individual mini-games to hone your skills and strive for S Rank on everything. Unlock more minigames here with your Arcade Tickets.

- **Marathon Mode (NEW):** Oops - all mini-games! Yep, every single one of them, in a row. Can you unlock this challenge, and make it through all 115? This is the ultimate test of accuracy and endurance: stretch your trigger fingers, make sure that headset is fully charged, and stay hydrated!
